placeName: Barker Character, Comic and Cartoon Museum
placeDesc: In this two-storied building, you can indulge in the amazing history of toys and cartoons. The grounds are covered in unique cartoon decorations from all genres and eras. The museum also hosts a scavenger hunt for kids. It’s certainly a visit that kids would enjoy and guaranteed to take any adult down memory lane. Inside, there is also an art gallery with gorgeous prints available.
placeShortDesc: A museum dedicated to antique toys, collectibles, and nostalgia.
placeRelatedPlaces: Handwerkerdörfl Pichla,Artipelag,Telephone Pioneer Museum of New Mexico,BAM Hamm Archives
